title: Add access logging, database export, enhanced login UX, copy buttons, footer links, and premium visual effects

requirements.text: Create an 'Activity Logs' section in the Admin Panel that displays access logs with Client ID, timestamp (date and time), and source IP address for monitoring client logins in real-time

quotes: No meu Painel Master, crie uma seção de 'Logs de Atividade'. O sistema deve registrar e exibir: [ID do Cliente], [Data/Hora do Acesso] e [Endereço IP de origem]

acceptanceCriteria: Admin Panel displays an 'Activity Logs' section with a table or list view
Each log entry shows Client ID, timestamp with date and time, and IP address
Logs are fetched from the backend and displayed in chronological order
Log entries are created automatically when clients log in

requirements.text: Add an 'Export Database' button in the Admin Panel that generates and downloads a JSON or CSV file containing all registered client IDs, IP addresses, and passwords for backup purposes

quotes: Adicione um botão no Painel ADM chamado 'Exportar Base de Dados'. Ao clicar, o sistema deve gerar um arquivo JSON ou CSV com todos os IDs, IPs e senhas cadastrados

acceptanceCriteria: Admin Panel has an 'Export Database' button clearly visible
Clicking the button triggers download of a file containing all client data
Export file includes Client ID, IP address, username, and password for each client
File format is either JSON or CSV

requirements.text: Display a styled red error alert (Toast or Modal) on the client login page when an invalid or non-existent Client ID is entered, with the message: '⚠️ ID not identified. Please check your contract or contact our support team.'

quotes: Se um cliente digitar um ID inexistente, exiba um alerta estilizado (Toast ou Modal) em vermelho: '⚠️ ID não identificado. Por favor, verifique seu contrato ou chame nossa equipe no suporte ao lado.'

acceptanceCriteria: Invalid Client ID triggers a visible error message in red
Error message displays: '⚠️ ID not identified. Please check your contract or contact our support team.'
Error is shown as a Toast notification or Modal dialog
Error styling is consistent with the application theme

requirements.text: Add a green neon loading effect to the client login page that appears when the 'Enter' button is clicked, providing visual feedback during authentication processing

quotes: Adicione um efeito de 'Loading' (carregamento) verde neon ao clicar em entrar, para dar sensação de processamento de alta velocidade

acceptanceCriteria: Login button shows a green neon loading indicator when clicked
Loading effect is visible during authentication processing
Loading effect uses the neon green color from the theme
Loading effect stops when authentication completes or fails

requirements.text: Add copy buttons (clipboard icon) next to the IP address, username, and password fields in the Client Dashboard that copy the value to clipboard and display a 'Copied!' confirmation message

quotes: Adicione um botão 'Copiar' (ícone de prancheta) ao lado do IP, Usuário e Senha. Ao clicar, deve aparecer uma pequena mensagem: 'Copiado!'

acceptanceCriteria: Copy button with clipboard icon appears next to IP address field
Copy button with clipboard icon appears next to username field
Copy button with clipboard icon appears next to password field
Clicking a copy button copies the corresponding value to clipboard
A 'Copied!' confirmation message appears after successful copy

requirements.text: Add footer links for 'Terms of Use' and 'Privacy Policy' in the Client Dashboard footer with placeholder generic text content that can be edited later

quotes: No rodapé do Dashboard, inclua links para 'Termos de Uso' e 'Política de Privacidade' (pode usar textos genéricos por enquanto que eu editarei depois)

acceptanceCriteria: Client Dashboard footer displays 'Terms of Use' link
Client Dashboard footer displays 'Privacy Policy' link
Links open pages or modals with placeholder generic text
Footer styling is consistent with the application theme

requirements.text: Apply a green glow effect to information cards throughout the application for a premium visual appearance

quotes: Aplique um efeito de 'Glow' (brilho suave) verde nos cards de informações

acceptanceCriteria: Information cards display a soft green glow effect
Glow effect uses the neon green color from the theme
Effect is applied consistently across all information cards
Glow enhances visual appeal without reducing readability

requirements.text: Add a green indicator dot to the Support Chat widget showing 'High Availability' operational status

quotes: Garanta que o Chat de Suporte que já está funcional tenha um indicador visual (uma bolinha verde) indicando que o sistema está operando em 'Alta Disponibilidade'

acceptanceCriteria: Support Chat widget displays a green indicator dot
Indicator visually communicates 'High Availability' status
Green color matches the neon green theme
Indicator is clearly visible when chat widget is displayed

constraints: Do not modify the existing database integration
Do not alter the credentials for the SidneiCosta00 admin account
Maintain compatibility with the existing client management system
Preserve the current authentication flow and session management
nonGoals: Changing the technology stack or framework
Implementing real-time IP tracking beyond login events
Implementing actual Terms of Use or Privacy Policy content
